articles.author: David Pierce
articles.title: The Light Phone 3 adds a better screen, a camera, and new ways to replace your smartphone - The Verge
articles.description: Light’s minimalist smartphones have been a success for years, and now the company is adding features like an OLED screen, a camera, and NFC to appeal to more people.
articles.content:
The Light Phone 3 is a little less light but a lot more useful
